title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You might be reluctant to appreciate your recent progress, especially if it's the result of a setback. Perhaps youre inclined not to make a big deal of your past because youre ashamed to share your personal history. But shame can stunt your growth and keep you from reaching your highest potential. Fear becomes a motivating force when you repeat old mistakes. Nevertheless, this is how evolution works; we learn from experience most of all. TV personality Andy Rooney said, Everyone wants to live on top of the mountain, but all the happiness and growth occurs while you're climbing it. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
